15522222221222222212.title: Female character

info.brief_description: You wake up in the hand of one of the Naruto characters, and they look hungry!
info.description:
You are a random ninja that just pissed off one of the naruto characters enough for them to shrink you and have thoughts of eating you!

No show crossovers, make the endings detailed. Those are the only rules!
